TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AnnoScope extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) accessibility interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about <xref:Accessibility.AnnoScope>, see the documentation on `Dynamic Properties` in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Accessibility.AnnoScope ANNO_CONTAINER = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Annotation is scoped to the container object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Accessibility.AnnoScope ANNO_THIS = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Annotation is scoped to the immediate object.
